page.title: 14MY HOUSE IN ABINGDON
page.content: My house is built out of bricks with a tiled roof.I go through the wooden front door of my semi-detached house and see the hall with the wooden book case and telephone.I walk through into the kitchen there is a sink, fridge , electric cooker, freezer,washing machine, drawers and cupboards.Through the back door there is quite a small garden with three hutches for my pets.In the dining room there is a record player,table,chairs,shelves, fire,coffee table, television,video and computer.Upstairs the first door leads to the bathroom.The second door leads to my bedroom,there is a wardrobe,dressing table,desk,drawers and a bed.The third door leads in to another bedroom,where there are two wardrobes,a double bed,and a dressing table.There is one other small bedroom. Written by Lisa Moore aged 11 years.
